summary: "Total Recall" is a 1990 sci-fi action movie directed by Paul Verhoeven and starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. It's based on a short story by Philip K. Dick. Schwarzenegger plays Douglas Quaid, a construction worker who gets fake memories of an adventure on Mars. But things get real when he uncovers his past as a secret agent fighting a Martian dictator. The film was in development for 16 years before Schwarzenegger helped get it made. It was a big hit, making over $260 million, and won an Oscar for its special effects. The ambiguous ending and themes of identity and authoritarianism have made it a sci-fi classic.
title: Total Recall (1990 film)
